mapper.select: select a.course_name, a.course_div, a.term_div,a.step_div, (select start_date from entry_sel_schdl where rcrt_no=a.rcrt_no and schdl_name=#{schdlRecruitment}) as recruitStartDate, (select end_date from entry_sel_schdl where rcrt_no=a.rcrt_no and schdl_name=#{schdlRecruitment}) as recruitEndDate, (select start_date from entry_sel_schdl where rcrt_no=a.rcrt_no and schdl_name=#{schdlAnnouncement}) as announcementStartDate, (select end_date from entry_sel_schdl where rcrt_no=a.rcrt_no and schdl_name=#{schdlAnnouncement}) as announcementEndDate, (select schdl_name from entry_sel_schdl where rcrt_no=a.rcrt_no and status_div=#{StatusPrepared} ) as schdlName from entry_sel_master as a where a.term_div like #{termDiv} and a.course_div like #{courseDiv} and a.course_name like #{courseName} and (a.status_div=#{StatusPreparing} or a.status_div=#{StatusPrepared})
